mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_NAME, R.REVIEW_STARRATE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN USER_INFO U ON R.USER_NUM=U.USER_NUM WHERE R.MOVIE_NUM=#{movieNum} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NUM DESC

SELECT M.IMAGE, M.TITLE, R.REVIEW_NUM, R.REVIEW_STARRATE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MOVIE M ON R.MOVIE_NUM=M.MOVIE_NUM WHERE R.USER_NUM=#{userNum} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(REVIEW_STARRATE, REVIEW_CONTENT, USER_NUM, MOVIE_NUM) VALUES(#{reviewStarrate}, #{reviewContent}, #{userNum}, #{movieNum})
